DOC.brief_summary: Non-comparative , observational , ambispective post-authorisation study ( EPA-SP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Post-Authorisation Study Use Bemfola® Human Assisted Reproductive Techniques Spain .
DOC.criteria: Women age ≥ 18 year Currently undergo IVF ICSI cycle oocytedonors Have complete controlled ovarian stimulation Have receive least 5 dos Bemfola® Are pituitary suppress GnRH antagonist Have undergone oocyte retrieval Have sign Informed Consent Form Hypersensitivity active substance follitropin alfa , FSH excipients list Presence tumour hypothalamus pituitary gland
